comment.body:
Lets Port It! 
We are all working with new software models to make things better and less centralized. Some look great on paper but when used it turns out to be something different. Testing and trial and error is the only way to build something fantastic.

Wow Cool!!! 
Another S.J.W. Site!!!  

I AM SO OFFENDED BY THIS!!! OMFG!!!! 

ALL SPEECH IS HATE SPEECH!!!!
ALL SPEECH IS HATE SPEECH!!!!
ALL SPEECH IS HATE SPEECH!!!!
@Daniell Mesquita: Sorry I had a LibTarded flashback..  (It was a border line twitter joke!) I totally apologize, if you missed the horrible punch line.
Fine, what does that code look like before it is changed. I bet you cant print it, unless you do a pic of it, and post it.
That looks like an exact clone of emacs org mode.
